_sText:
This is my second race map for the CS:S rally race mod.
This time the theme is lego(as you can see in the map name).

What does the map contain:
- Track with 4 laps and a shortcut(Medium track time: 4min)
- Fun zone
- 2 Ready zones(one near the spawn, other in the tower)
- 1 Spectator zone
- A small system for the wise guys that love to race in reverse donÂ´t do it
- FRAGXL.com bilboards
- Lego textures
- A lot of fun

If you find some missing texture, please send me a PM or report here and give also suggestions so that I can improve the map! 
It's all for now, hope you enjoy ;)
---
In order to play this map, you need Rally Race Mod installed in your server. If you want to play this map, you can join FRAGXL.com | Rally RaceMania - 80.172.230.146:27015
